data.title: Legislative Report: July 1, 2022-July 1, 2023
data.excerpt: Overview The Office of Data and Innovation (ODI) was established on July 1, 2019, as an office within the Government Operations Agency (GovOps) and became a standalone department on July 1, 2023. This year’s legislative report showcases the progress made during the 2022-2023 fiscal year. It includes key work, resulting from two Executive Orders issued … Read more
data.author: Michael Sullivan

Any project work beyond 7/1/2024 is subject to the appropriation and availability of funds.","id":"1603f9b6-635a-4c10-88de-36b81c8f1773"},{"content":"Funded through ODI General Fund Appropriation.","id":"43ac7b37-aab9-4d8b-9b99-78212f724297"}]
